Description: The following statement contains a magic number: lock (Lock)              {                  if (ActiveTimers.Count > 0)                  {                      var timer = ActiveTimers.Pop();                      timer.Finished = Stopwatch.ElapsedTicks;                      double elapsed = (timer.Finished - timer.Started) / 10000.0;                      for (int i = 0; i < EnabledBuckets.Count; i++)                      {                          if (Match(EnabledBuckets[i]' timer.Bucket))                          {                              Console.WriteLine("[@{0:0.00}s] {1} took {2}ms"'                                  Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds / 1000.0' timer.Bucket' elapsed);                              break;                          }                      }                      if (LogLag && lag != -1 && elapsed > lag)                          Console.WriteLine("{0} is lagging by {1}ms"' timer.Bucket' elapsed);                  }              }
